title: Customer Billing Dispute - Data Overage
description: An agent must resolve a customer's claim of being overcharged due to unexpected data usage fees.

tasks.description: Retrieve customer account and current billing cycle details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and the relevant bill.

tasks.description: Analyze data usage logs for the billing period to identify the source of the overage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints specific dates and times of high data consumption.

tasks.description: Explain the data overage charges and offer a one-time courtesy credit as a goodwill gesture.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the charges and successfully applies a credit.
